domains.name: Blockchain
domains.description: Explores decentralized technologies, smart contracts, and blockchain applications.

events.name: Crypto Countdown: Final Block of 2024
events.description: Crypto Countdown was a two-day online seminar covering blockchain fundamentals, decentralized finance (DeFi), smart contracts, and the future of Web3. Industry experts provided insights into blockchain's impact on business and security.

domains.name: Computative Programming
domains.description: Focuses on problem-solving, algorithms, and competitive programming challenges.

events.name: Output Unveiled
events.description: Output Unveiled was an intense coding contest where participants solved 16 programming challenges in C and C++, unlocking each level with the output of the previous question. It tested logical thinking, debugging, and problem-solving skills.

events.name: PyMind
events.description: PyMind was an engaging Python-based quiz competition for first-year students. Covering basic to advanced Python topics, the quiz provided a competitive yet supportive environment to test and enhance programming skills.

events.name: Master The Code
events.description: A timed coding competition with algorithmic challenges to test participants' problem-solving skills and coding speed.

domains.name: Cloud Computing
domains.description: Covers cloud services, deployment, and scaling applications.

domains.name: Cyber Security
domains.description: Focuses on ethical hacking, cryptography, and securing applications.

events.name: Cyber Hive
events.description: Cyber Hive was an interactive seminar focused on cybersecurity awareness, scam prevention, and career opportunities in cybersecurity and networking. It featured live demonstrations of security threats and best practices for digital safety.

domains.name: Data Analytics
domains.description: Covers data visualization, machine learning, and big data analytics.

domains.description: Focuses on data structures and algorithms for efficient problem-solving.
